short_summary: The tender is for the purchase of a low-pressure injection machine by the National Research Council of Canada.
description:
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC), Boucherville site, is seeking to acquire a low pressure injection machine for its activities related to liquid moulding manufacturing of carbon fibre and glass fibre reinforced thermoset polymer composites. \n
This new injection machine will improve NRC advanced manufacturing capabilities for high volume composite manufacturing process with thermoset resin systems. It will support the activities of its team in charge of developing advanced polymer composites for the transportation industry.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice for the Provision of Low Pressure Injection Machine

## Overview
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) in Boucherville is seeking to procure a low pressure injection machine to support its activities related to liquid moulding manufacturing of carbon fibre and glass fibre reinforced thermoset polymer composites.

## Tender Details
| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference** | cb-474-99539206 |
| **Solicitation** | 23-58118 |
| **Publication Date** | October 19, 2023 |
| **Closing Date** | November 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | November 30, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | June 30, 2024 |

## Machine Requirements
The procured low pressure injection machine must be capable of supporting the NRC's advanced manufacturing capabilities for high volume composite manufacturing process with thermoset resin systems.

## Procurement Method
This tender will be conducted through an open bidding process, with selection based on the lowest price.

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
The completed machine is expected to be delivered to the NRC's site in Boucherville, Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region).

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact Kacendra Dion at kacendra.dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca or (438) 324-8125.

## Online Resources
The tender notices, including the pre-qualification and qualification questions, as well as additional supporting documents, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22603](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22603) .
